mapper.select: SELECT s.deal_amount, e.build_year FROM all_real_estate e JOIN all_real_estate_sales s ON e.id = s.estate_id WHERE e.latitude BETWEEN #{lat} - 0.000001 AND #{lat} + 0.000001 AND e.longitude BETWEEN #{lng} - 0.000001 AND #{lng} + 0.000001 ORDER BY s.deal_year DESC, s.deal_month DESC, s.deal_day DESC LIMIT 1;
